accountId.description: The id of the account this folder belongs to.

isFavorite.description: Whether this folder is a favorite folder.

isRoot.description: Whether this folder is a root folder.

isTag.description: Whether this folder is a virtual tag folder.

isVirtual.description: Whether this folder is a virtual search folder.

name.description: The human-friendly name of this folder.

path.description: Path to this folder in the account. Although paths look predictable, never guess a folder's path, as there are a number of reasons why it may not be what you think it is. Use :ref:`folders.getParentFolders` or :ref:`folders.getSubFolders` to obtain hierarchy information.

specialUse.description: The special use of this folder. A folder can have multiple special uses.

subFolders.description: Subfolders of this folder. The property may be <value>null</value>, if inclusion of folders had not been requested. The folders will be returned in the same order as used in Thunderbird's folder pane.

type.description: Deprecated. Was used to represent the type of this folder.

types.description: A unique id representing a :ref:`folders.MailFolder` throughout a session. Renaming or moving a folder will invalidate its id.

lastUsed.description: Date the folder was last used (precision: seconds).

newMessageCount.description: Number of new messages in this folder.

totalMessageCount.description: Number of messages in this folder.

unreadMessageCount.description: Number of unread messages in this folder.

type.description: The type of the quota as defined by RFC2087. A <value>STORAGE</value> quota is constraining the available storage in bytes, a <value>MESSAGE</value> quota is constraining the number of storable messages.

min.description: The minimum value required to match the query.

max.description: The maximum value required to match the query.

flags.description: Supported RegExp flags: <value>i</value> = case insensitive, and/or one of <value>u</value> = unicode support or <value>v</value> = extended unicode support

DEFAULT_MOST_RECENT_LIMIT.description: The number of most recent folders used in Thunderbird's UI. Controled by the <value>mail.folder_widget.max_recent</value> preference.

functions.name: query
functions.description: Gets folders that match the specified properties, or all folders if no properties are specified.

accountId.description: Limits the search to folders of the account with the specified id.

canAddMessages.description: Whether the folder supports adding new messages, or not.

canAddSubfolders.description: Whether the folder supports adding new subfolders, or not.

canBeDeleted.description: Whether the folder can be deleted, or not.

canBeRenamed.description: Whether the folder can be renamed, or not.

canDeleteMessages.description: Whether the folder supports deleting messages, or not.

folderId.description: Limits the search to the folder with the specified id.

hasMessages.description: Whether the folder (excluding subfolders) contains messages, or not. Supports to specify a :ref:`folders.QueryRange` (min/max) instead of a simple boolean value (none/some).

hasUnreadMessages.description: Whether the folder (excluding subfolders) contains unread messages, or not. Supports to specify a :ref:`folders.QueryRange` (min/max) instead of a simple boolean value (none/some).

hasNewMessages.description: Whether the folder (excluding subfolders) contains new messages, or not. Supports to specify a :ref:`folders.QueryRange` (min/max) instead of a simple boolean value (none/some).

hasSubFolders.description: Whether the folder has subfolders, or not. Supports to specify a :ref:`folders.QueryRange` (min/max) instead of a simple boolean value (none/some).

isFavorite.description: Whether the folder is a favorite folder, or not.

isRoot.description: Whether the folder is a root folder, or not.

isTag.description: Whether the folder is a virtual tag folder, or not. Note: Virtual tag folders are always skipped, unless this property is set to <value>true</value>

isUnified.description: Whether the folder is a unified mailbox folder, or not. Note: Unified mailbox folders are always skipped, unless this property is set to <value>true</value>

isVirtual.description: Whether the folder is a virtual search folder, or not.

limit.description: Limits the number of returned folders. If used together with <value>recent</value>, supports being set to :ref:`folders.DEFAULT_MOST_RECENT_LIMIT`

name.description: Return only folders whose name is matched by the provided string or regular expression.

path.description: Return only folders whose path is matched by the provided string or regular expression.

recent.description: Whether the folder (excluding subfolders) has been used within the last month, or not. The returned folders will be sorted by their recentness.

specialUse.description: Match only folders with the specified special use (folders have to match all specified uses).

type.description: Deprecated. Match only folders with the specified special use.
